sense.gloss: ready fire-power, battle-ready forces, immediate asset (to a team or firm), someone who can be an immediately effective player or worker

sdata.j: さらに、↑即↑↓|そく↓↑戦力↑↓せんりょく|↓となる↑政策↑↓せいさく↓↑関連↑↓かんれん↓の↑科学↑↓かがく↓↑的↑↓てき↓↑成果↑↓せいか↓や↑手段↑↓しゅだん↓の↑提供↑↓ていきょう↓が↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓であると↑強調↑↓きょうちょう↓した。
sdata.e: Moreover, they underscored the need for providing policy relevant ready-to-use scientific results and methodology.
